data.name: Slime Rancher: Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Slime Rancher Original Soundtrack includes 37 tracks digitally remastered and un-looped by composer Harry Mack. All tracks are recorded in high-quality mp3 format.

Includes the song '1,000 Light Years Away' performed by Chelsea Lee Greenwood.

Once purchased, files will be located in Steam\steamapps\common\SlimeRancher\Slime Rancher Original Soundtrack

Track List:

Dry Reef - Theme
Ranch - Theme
Indigo Quarry - Theme
Ancient Ruins - Theme
Glass Desert - Theme
Slime Sea - Sunlit Waves
Those Awful Ravenous Rainbows
Radio - Elevator Shimmy
Dry Reef - Relaxed
Indigo Quarry - Relaxed
Moss Blanket - Relaxed
Ancient Ruins - Courtyard
Ancient Ruins - Relaxed
Glass Desert - Relaxed
Desert - Heating Up
Desert - Firestorm
She's On Fire!
Radio - Jazzy
Ranch - Night
Dry Reef - Night
Indigo Quarry - Night
Moss Blanket - Night
Ancient Ruins - Night
Glass Desert - Night
Less Awful Ravenous Rainbows
Let's Go, Beatrix!
Radio - Romantic
Ranch - Late Night
Dry Reef - Late Night
Indigo Quarry - Late Night
Moss Blanket - Late Night
Ancient Ruins - Late Night
Slime Sea - Moonlit Calm
Radio - Good Morning
Ranch - Wistful
1,000 Light Years Away
